reviews.review_msg: Kamal is an above average prof, he does his best to make you keep up with the course material. The problem is the course is horribly boring, don't take it if you don't have to.

The class is fairly easy as long as you know something about computers or know someone who can help you out. Do every assignment, but don't put tons of time into them because they're only worth 10 marks each.
excellent teacher, fun in class, & very helpful
